name: ETSI GS MEC 010-2 - Part 2: Application lifecycle, rules and requirements management

routes.documentation: Queries information relating to on-boarded application packages in the MEO

responses.label: Contains a representation of the application package resource
Bad Request : used to indicate that incorrect parameters were passed to the request.
Unauthorized :  used when the client did not submit credentials.
Forbidden :  operation is not allowed given the current status of the resource.
Not Found :  used when a client provided a URI that cannot be mapped to a valid resource URI.
Not Acceptable : used to indicate that the server cannot provide the any of the content formats supported by the client.
Too Many Requests : used when a rate limiter has triggered.
